56.eng-name: Fighting for the Cause of Allah (Jihaad)

hadiths.text: Narrated Anas:The Prophet (ﷺ) was the best, the bravest and the most generous of all the people. Once when the people of Medina got frightened, the Prophet (ﷺ) rode a horse and went ahead of them and said, "We found this horse very fast

chapter.eng-name: Bravery and cowardice in the battle
